titles.title: Lord, everything I have You gave to me.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, everything I have You gave to me.
There is nothing that compares to Your love and liberty.
In my darkness You're the Light, and You shine through me.
You come and break my chains, and You make me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You do all things well.
Lord, this is my declaration.
You can do nothing but good,
When my heart belongs to You.
You won't lead me astray.
Where I go Your hand will guide me.
Whatever my state, may my heart always say
You do all things well.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And in the trial of my faith, You strengthen me.
When questions arise, You hear me.
When I feel like thirsty ground, You flow through me.
Though I fail to understand, You help me see.
